title: How to setup a smartphone review and technology blog - Quora

response.answer_text: Step 1: Scout the field Take a look at a few established websites that specialise in the niche you are asking about, smartphone and mobile review. Here are a few sites to take a look at:  The Gadgets StarAndroid AppsGSM Phone ReviewsTry Googling, and find a few more sites that are popular in Google Search. Step 2: Decide Your Platform Though there are many platforms to blog on, Wordpress and Blogger have been dominating the market. Whatever you do, DO NOT sign up for a free wordpress.com website. They do NOT give you ANY freedom. So, you have only two options: Blogger(Free, by Google) and Wordpress(Self Hosted; Costs $$$). Next, get yourself a domain name. The name should be easy to remember and catchy to hear. You can buy yourself a .com domain on GoDaddy. Step 3: Configure Template Install a template for your blog. In the staring, a simple, free template is enough.  Step 4: Start Blogging!

If you are in a thought of setting up your own blog with this smart-phone review and technology theme then first of all you need to decide and choose few things like 1) Choose the platform where in you want to create your blog. ( Blogger/WordPress). 2) After choosing it, decide on what topics you want to share information, like categorize the topics on the basis of that, later on you can decide the theme/Template of your blog. 3) Then start customizing widgets and layouts and everything as per you have decided.  Keep doing all this till your layout is completely setup, until you can start posting. After setting up, keep an eye on all the mobile review websites and keep posting news, reviews, tips, tricks and all in your blog.  For your reference you can visit this blog, the same theme - http://ifabworld.blogspot.com/ .  Work on this and share your experience.
